Introduction

ChaeWon is a South Korean singer and dancer under MODHAUS.

On July 17, 2023, ChaeWon was announced as a contestant on the SBS survival show "Universe Ticket". She was eliminated during the second round, in the fourth episode.

On April 1, 2024, ChaeWon was introduced as the twenty-first member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She debuted with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, ChaeWon was placed in the sub-unit Glow and Hatchi!.
